block_message_update_description: Block the possibility for agents to change message texts in livechat?
block_message_quote_description: Block agents from quoting messages on livechat?
block_message_remove_description: Block agents from removing messages in livechat?
notify_user_alias_description: What username to display when notifying users about locks?
notify_avatar_emoji_description: Which emoji avatar to display when notifying users about blocks?
